solution_line_template: After baking cookies, Lucy had {initial_flour_grams} - {used_flour_grams} = <<{initial_flour_grams}-{used_flour_grams}={flour_after_baking}>>{flour_after_baking}g of flour left.
She accidentally spilled half of this, which means she had {flour_after_baking} * {spill_fraction} = <<{flour_after_baking}*{spill_fraction}={flour_after_spill}>>{flour_after_spill}g of flour left.
